articles.title: Allison Koh
articles.contents:
Allison Koh
          
          
          Home
          CV
          â˜°
          
          
      
        
          
            
          
            Allison Koh
          
          
            
          
          
            
            I am a PhD Candidate at the Centre for International Security, Hertie School and Doctoral Research Fellow at the Berlin Graduate School for Global and Transregional Studies. My research focuses on state-sponsored online harassment, contentious politics in the digital age, and natural language processing for analyzing political texts.
